description: WordPerfect users who want to distribute the same document to multiple people, but customize the document so it contains each recipient's name, address, and/or other information, can do so using a mail merge. To perform a mail merge, a user:

The form a user creates as part of this process is saved as a WPF file. When a user finalizes their mail merge, WordPerfect uses the imported data source and WPF file to create a series of customized WordPerfect documents.
